name: TRAUMA MOVE: LASH OUT AT AN NPC

system.description: When you lash out at an NPC in furious anger, roll with BLOOD.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you completely lose control of your ectoplasmic form; mark corruption.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value:
On a hit, clear all trauma and inflict harm as established.

On a 7-9, your violence is wild; it leaves you vulnerable, gets out of hand, or causes some collateral damage, MCâ€™s choice.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: On a hit, clear all trauma and inflict harm as established.
